label: NE-NAS-PD01Z
description: PIR motion sensor and light measurement

2.label: ON / OFF Duration
2.description: How long should the associated devices have ON status.

4.label: PIR detection ENABLED / DISABLED
4.description: Enable og disable the PIR sensor

5.label: Ambent illumination LUX level
5.description: Lux value which determines when the light sensor is activated

6.label: Re-Trigger Interval
6.description: Adjust the interval of being re-triggered

7.label: Light sensor polling interval
7.description: How often should ambient illumination be evaluated

9.label: Ambient illumination report
9.description: when lux changes by the number in this setting it is reported
